name: Thought Shield II
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Occult Adventures © 2015, Paizo Inc.
text: This functions as thought shield I, but the circumstance bonus on Will saves to resist mind-affecting effects increases to +6. This spell can be undercast.
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同思维护盾 I（Thought Shield I）一般，不过在抵御影响心灵（mind-affecting）效果时，意志豁免得到的环境加值增加至+6点。该法术可以被降阶施法。
